description:
The United States, 2045. Working as mercenaries, the Major and her team, including newbie Stan, defend a gated town from outlaws. Togusa takes a call.
Source: netflix

titles.title: NO NOISE NO LIFE 持続可能戦争
No Noise No Life: Jizokukanou Sensou
No Noise No Life: Sustainable War
SEM BARULHO NÃO HÁ VIDA - Guerra sustentável
